title: 1507Supreme Court allows Trump administration to limit gender passport markers(www.lex18.com)posted6
content:
1507 Supreme Court allows Trump administration to limit gender passport markers (www.lex18.com) posted 6 days ago by TheMrStone 68 comments award share report block Supreme Court allows Trump administration to limit gender passport markers The Supreme Court will allow the Trump administration to block transgender and nonbinary Americans from choosing passport sex markers. www.lex18.com
68 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Pyroth5687 107 points 6 days ago Well, Of course... The state department determines what will be on the passport not a retarded troon. permalink award report block reply BlackPilledMAGA 33 points 6 days ago Actually biology determines it, not some fucking troom's wish. permalink parent award report block reply The_Return_of_User_x 11 points 6 days ago I hope he/she passports get invalidated while abroad. permalink parent award report block reply Choppermagic 2 points 6 days ago send them to the middle east permalink parent award report block reply Valiazaner 26 points 6 days ago I mean it's not even that. A Passport is a document owned by the US government entrusted to a citizen. That document is asking a foreign government to allow that citizen entry and to afford them all the rights and privileges an American citizen can expect to enjoy while in that nation. If you are trying to enter a nation such as Saudi Arabia that has none of that non sense then an X or a "they/them" on a passport will not only devalue the passport but also potentially put the holder in danger. A passport is a document that is supposed to grant entry to other nations. Weird gender shit weakens the US passport. permalink parent award report block reply NotYourMan 2 points 6 days ago Well that isn't a surprise.  One of the goals of a passport is to identify somebody and they can't be identified by their latest crazy idea of who they are.  But they can be identified by the biological sex.  That works great. permalink parent award report block reply Just_a_Patriot 56 points 6 days ago No one has to pay along with these people's unchecked imaginations. permalink award report block reply Johnkimble111 2 points 6 days ago I think the genuinely intersex people might have had a case here legally but there’s barely any of those around. Pretty retarded to have trannies bring this case. They always use intersex people as proof of things not being binary and it would be assured to recognise people just basically pretending to be intersex or the opposite sex. permalink parent award report block reply xanax123 3 points 6 days ago Drop the intersex nonsense.
